title: Sterling Silver Celtic Love Eternity Knot - Double Sided - (Pendant Only or Necklace)
features: Hand Cast in the USA, Solid Sterling Silver .925
Double Sided: Detail on Both Sides
All Chain Styles and Lengths are Solid Sterling Silver
Comes in a Small Box with a Bow, Polishing Cloth and Care Instructions
description: About the chain STYLES:  ❤ 1.5mm Cable Chain: This is the lightest chain we offer and is best for single, small charms or pendants. Because they are small and light this is a comfortable chain for everyday wear paired with a small charm.  ❤ 1.5mm Ball Chain: This a great medium weight chain for some of the larger pendants but also works well with one or more of the small charms.  ❤ 2mm Paperclip Chain: This is a great "all-purpose" chain. You can use it for one small charm or a whole bunch of medium sized ones!  ❤ 1.5mm Box Chain: This one has the most sparkle and is great if you want to make a bit more of a statement. Works equally well with one small charm as it does with the heavier pendants.  ❤ 1.5mm Wheat Chain: This one is a tad heavier than the 1.5mm box and a little more understated (less sparkly). It goes well with pretty much everything and is strong enough for all of the big pendants.  About Chain LENGTH:  ❤ 16 Inch is best for small and/or younger people. Fairly short but not quite a choker.  ❤ 18 Inch is the standard "all-purpose" length and the best one to choose if you a picking out a gift and are unsure which to get. Most men will need at least an 18" or longer.  ❤ 20 and 22 are great in-between lengths - not too short but not super long either. These are great for layering.  ❤ 24 and 30 inch are "over-the-head" lengths if you love longer chains or just don't like messing with clasps.  ★Little Devil Designs is a Small, Woman-Owned business★
